name: Light of My Life (Walter Keiler, system.c12ashe)
name_original: Light of My Life (Walter Keiler, system.c12ashe)
description:
Play as a lil firefly on your first week at a new job at Insecta Inc.! During your first week here, you meet your VERY friendly coworkers as they try to impress you and make you fall in love with them.

To play the game, follow your heart to find the light of your life!
